name: Pixel Girl 像素女孩
description:
Pixel Girl is a Pixel style horizontal scroll ARPG. The protagonist is a 15-year-old girl. According to the custom of the village, she would go out into the wild on her birthday alone for survival training. A series of interesting stories followed!key Features
  • Action system - You have many attack moves, such as running, second jump, combination boxing, drop hook, sliding tackle, second fly kick, unlimited hit, defense, etc.
  • Weapons - You can use many game weapons, such as throwing, bombs, using knives, sticks, pistols, machine guns, shotguns, RPG.
  • Props - You can use props to improve various abilities, such as attack power, defense power, moving speed, jumping height, etc.
  • Critical strike ability - You can collect blue gems to increase your critical strike ability..
  • Attack immunity - You can collect green gems to increase your attack immunity.
  • Pet - You can carry pet, flying, kicking, throwing, assists, automatic counterattacks, etc.
  • New Game Plus - You can choose New Game Plus at the end of the game.
